item.title: Open Terms Archive now tracks all published DSA Systemic Risk Assessment Reports from very large online platforms
item.description:
Paris, October 3, 2025

Open Terms Archive now archives and tracks all DSA systemic risk assessment Reports across the 21 very large online platforms that have published them to date, creating a dedicated dataset for this new type of document.

Leveraging its open-source software, originally designed to monitor changes to online servicesâ€™ contractual documents, the team developed a new collection that automatically archives and tracks Systemic Risk Assessment Reports published in compliance with the EU Digital Services Act (DSA).
